game.name: Furious Road Game  Low poly Car Racing
game.description:
In this one of the best racing games for boys, you have to control a low poly car on an amazing track. Oh no! The problem is that you are not alone on the road as it is full of other vehicles that actually do not want you to overtake them. Do you think that you can challenge them over the difficult racing track? Join Furious Road Game Low Poly Car Racing and be prepared to drive your chosen vehicle at high speed and beat other vehicles like a pro! 

Common boys! The character of this HTML5 car game needs you urgently as he has got participated in several leading racing tours. Grab your car and tighten your seatbelt and get ready to race your vehicle on a long road! Be careful and try to grab as much fuel as you can to keep your character alive in the game! Your every successful fuel collection will give you some more time to drive. Avoid the collision otherwise, you will lose!  Select from anyone between the two-track options including Black Dessert and Snow Mountain! 

With the money you earn along the way, you will be able to upgrade your speed, handle, acceleration, and brake. When the game finishes, a screen will be shown mentioning the status of your present score, the distance you have covered, your best record, bonus money, and cash you have earned during the level. This car race simulating game features multiple lands to explode, insane gameplay, and an extremely soothing sound effect. Play free racing games on atmegame.com without download and satisfy your craving for speed to the optimum level possible!
